beer.name: Brabant
beer.description: Experimentation. Ales and lagers that defy styles or categories. This is what we are about: our driving force, our passion. To further facilitate this innovative spirit, we've developed our Barrel-Aged Series where anything, and we mean ANYTHING, goes! Brewed for those as adventurous as we are!
beer.grains: Two-row barley, dehusked carafa, honey malt, carafa 3, chocolate malt
Two-row barley, dehusked carafa, honey malt, carafa 3, chocolate malt
